changes: 🧩 The new version 2 release includes complete changes to the entire UI and features of the KDS.
🕒 Send and receive real-time orders between the POS and the Kitchen Display System (KDS).
📱 The release has support for both mobile and web version of the KDS. The web version is available through the Embook Pro POS
🌙 The dark and light theme has been also added to improve usability, accessibility and energy efficiency
🐞 Bug fixed with assigning category to product and opening external links.
